channel.title: Barrage on npc error [pi]
channel.description:
whenever i try to do the barrage on a npc i get this error... Loaded clipmap in 31ms. [code] [7/26/12 2:26 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1172 [7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(Comba tAssistant.java:598) [7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1727)
[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:151) [7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:193)[/code] and when the npc gets close it doese nothing if i then switch off of mage into mele i do no damage, not even a mark from the hit (the npc is hitting me tho). anybody know why?
[b][size=24pt]EDIT[/size][/b] [size=12pt]I just tried it with different spells... same thing happenes, why is that error comming up when i try to use mage on npc?[/size]

item.title: Barrage on npc error [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

whenever i try to do the barrage on a npc i get this error… Loaded clipmap in 31ms.

[code]
[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1172
[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(Comba
tAssistant.java:598)
[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1727)

[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand
ler.java:151)
[7/26/12 2:26 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:193)[/code]
and when the npc gets close it doese nothing if i then switch off of mage into mele i do no damage, not even a mark from the hit (the npc is hitting me tho).
anybody know why?

[size=24pt]EDIT[/size]
[size=12pt]I just tried it with different spells… same thing happenes, why is that error comming up when i try to use mage on npc?[/size]
